mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_USER
USER_NAME = #{userName},
USER_TYPE = #{userType},
EMAIL = #{email},
PHONE = #{phone},
STATUS = #{status},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId},
DESCRIPTION = #{description},
START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate}, END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{request.userId}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = current_timestamp
WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE SYS_USER SET PASSWORD_ENCRYPTED = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_PASSWORD_UPDATE_DATE = current_timestamp WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT, SU.EMPLOYEE_ID, IR.CODE as ROLE_CODE, HE.EMPLOYEE_CODE AS EMPLOYEE_CODE, HE.NAME AS EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM SYS_USER SU LEFT OUTER JOIN IAM_MEMBER_ROLE IMR ON SU.USER_ID = IMR.MEMBER_ID AND IMR.MEMBER_TYPE='user' LEFT OUTER JOIN IAM_ROLE IR ON IR.ID = IMR.ROLE_ID AND IR.IS_ENABLED = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE HE ON SU.EMPLOYEE_ID = HE.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT SU.USER_NAME, SU.USER_ID FROM HR_EMPLOYEE HE INNER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.EMPLOYEE_ID = HE.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE HE.EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode}

#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT DISTINCT su.user_id,su.user_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr ON ( imr.member_id = su.user_id and imr.member_type = 'user') LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON ir.id = imr.role_id LEFT JOIN iam_role_tl irt ON (ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{__current_lang})
AND ( su.user_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR irt.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )
AND su.user_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.userName}),'%')
AND irt.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleAssignmentSearchDTO.roleName}),'%')
order by su.user_id desc
